Texts.Chs: 欢迎来到你的新机甲！花几分钟逛逛周围，了解如何使用它吧。你可以^#FF1493;按下键进行躲避^reset;，或者^#FF1493;连按左/右键进行冲刺^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Welcome to your new mech! Take a moment to move around and get used to it. You can ^#FF1493;duck by pressing ^#FF1493;down^reset;, or ^#FF1493;sprint with a ^#FF1493;double-tap!^reset;

Texts.Chs: 机甲拥有有力的腿部伺服系统，允许你跳得更高。尝试着跳起来以到达下一层吧。
Texts.Eng: Mechs have powerful leg servos that allow you to jump pretty well. Try leaping up to reach the next floor.

Texts.Chs: 要想到达这里的出口，你需要向左边前进。你的机甲可以从顶部蹲伏通过缺口。
Texts.Eng: To reach the exit here, you'll have to take the left side. Your mech can crouch through the gap on the top.

Texts.Chs: 零重力战斗要比平地上的更为棘手。精度是至关重要的，因此你需要学会正确引导你的目标。
Texts.Eng: Zero gravity combat is a bit trickier than on flat ground. Accuracy is important, so you'll need to learn to lead your targets properly.

Texts.Chs: 警告：你的载具无法豁免^FF4500;灵能环境^reset;！忽略该警告信息可能会导致驾驶员的死亡，或者无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:
WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified 
for this ^#FF1493;weird^reset; environment!
Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs: 警告：你的载具无法豁免^FF4500;高压环境^reset;！忽略该警告信息可能会导致驾驶员的死亡，或者无法获得该载具的保修报销。
Texts.Eng:

Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

WARNING: Your vehicle is not certified

Disregarding this warning may cause pilot death and/or invalidation of vehicle warranty.

Texts.Chs: 危险！这种液体可以使机甲系统短路。我们应该尽快离开这里。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! This fluid is rapidly shorting out every system on board the mech. We should leave this liquid soon or risk death.

Texts.Chs: 有意思。这种液体可以恢复机甲的能量，而不是引起负面效果。
Texts.Eng: Curious. This liquid appears to be restoring your mechs energy, rather than causing negative effects.

Texts.Chs: 危险！机甲温控系统正在逐渐失效！请立即撤退！
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mech's temperature control systems are failing! Evacuate immediately!

Texts.Chs: 危险！毒水看起来已经渗入了机甲组件，造成了严重的损坏。你应该尽快离开这里。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! This poisonous water seems to seep into your mechs components and cause serious issues. You should get out sooner than later.

Texts.Chs: 危险！液氮正在迅速冻结机甲的伺服系统和组件！这并不是好事。请尽快撤退，否则你会后悔的。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Your mechs servos and components are rapidly freezing within the liquid nitrogen. That isn't a good thing. Evacuate soon or you will know regret.

Texts.Chs: 危险！硫酸已经破坏了你的机甲镀层。我建议你立刻离开。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! Sulphuric acid has compromised your mech plating. I suggest leaving the liquid immediately.

Texts.Chs: 危险！远古液正让你的机甲变得脆弱！请尽快离开。
Texts.Eng: DANGER! The Elder Fluid is rapidly turning your mech into pudding! Get out swiftly!
